### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) 
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) 
-  Transport belt (position (-16.5, -51.5)) 
-  Transport belt (position (-15.5, -51.5)) 
-  Transport belt (position (-14.5, -51.5)) 
-  Transport belt (position (-13.5, -51.5)) 

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) 
-  Belt group connecting furnace to inserter

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) 
-  Belt group connecting inserter to chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining with burner mining drill
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the burner mining drill before mining
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the mining drill

### Errors when using furnace
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the furnace before smelting
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to produce the desired output

### Errors when using inserter
-  Make sure the inserter has a source of items to pick up
-  Ensure the inserter has a valid drop position to place the items

### NAMESPACE
*   Utility functions: None
*   Important variables:
    *   `wooden-chest`: 2
    *   `transport-belt`: 7
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: 1
    *   `stone-furnace`: 1
    *   `iron-ore`: 1074
    *   `iron-plate`: 168
